column4: Evening all - Is 8.04 LTS to 10.04 LTS supported yet? do-release-upgrade with Prompt=lts doesn't find a new distribution and meta-release-lts doesn't list it... :-/
I beleive it is, but I'm not sure.
darolu: de.archive... (german colocated server)... do-release-upgrade doesn't work but do-release-upgrade -d does... wonder if someone forgot to throw a switch ;)
